item.title: INDIE Live Expo set for November 29
item.content:encoded:
Developers can now submit their titles for consideration.

Ryu’s Office will host an INDIE Live Expo showcase on November 29, the company announced. You will be able to watch it on YouTube, Twitter (English, Japanese, Korean), Twitch (English, Japanese), Niconico, Bilibili, and Steam.

The broadcast will feature “a feast of world premieres of unrevealed titles alongside the latest information for highly anticipated games,” including the return of the INDIE Waves’ rapid-fire 15-second updates, INDIE Spotlight’s deep dives into hand-selected titles, and the annual INDIE Live Expo Award Show.

Independent developers and publishers can now submit their games for consideration in the showcase. Submissions will close on September 29 at 7:59 p.m. PT / 10:59 p.m. ET.

“The most exciting time of the year for us is when we open up game submissions,” said Ryu’s Office founder and CEO Ryuta Konuma in a press release. “There is so much creativity within the indie space. We’re immensely grateful for all of the developers, publishers, and INDIE Live Expo fans around the world that continue to make this event possible.”



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/indie-live-expo-set-for-november-29

item.title: 2XKO adds Blitzcrank
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Playable in the upcoming closed beta test.

Blitzcrank, the Great Steam Golem, will be a playable champion in League of Legends-based free-to-play tag fighting game 2XKO, developer Riot Games announced.

The new champion will also be playable during the closed beta test, which was previously announced to be starting on September 9. Registration is available via the game’s official website.

2XKO is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC in 2025.

Watch a new trailer below.

Blitzcrank Gameplay Reveal Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/2xko-adds-blitzcrank

item.title: PAC-MAN WORLD 2 Re-PAC ‘Gameplay’ trailer
item.content:encoded:
Publisher Bandai Namco and developer NOW PRODUCTION have released a gameplay trailer for action platformer remake PAC-MAN WORLD 2 Re-PAC.

Here is an overview of the game, via Bandai Namco:

About

Adventure is back on the menu!

In PAC-MAN WORLD 2 Re-PAC, Pac-Man World 2 is back with a fresh coat of paint and brand-new features!

With modern graphics, expanded levels and Pac-Village, quality of life improvements, and voice acting—PAC-MAN WORLD 2 Re-PAC is the fan favorite remade from scratch with the original recipe.

The adventure is back on the menu!

Key Features

  • Retrieve the Golden Fruit! – The Ghosts snuck into PAC-Village and stole the Golden Fruit, unwittingly freeing the all-powerful ghost king, Spooky! PAC-MAN must venture across PAC-LAND to reclaim the Golden Fruit and put a stop to the dastardly Spooky!
  • A World of Fun – Run, chomp, butt-bounce, and more to meet PAC-LAND’s challenge and charm! From B-Doing Tree Tops to ice skating in Snowy Mountain, and taking aim from the PAC-Marine deep in the Ocean. Rev roll in Paradise Meadows, Flutter jump over lava in the Volcano, and PAC-Dot attack through Ghost Island! PAC-MAN is ready for action!
  • Remade for all PAC Players! – With modern graphics, expanded levels and PAC-Village, quality of life improvements, and voice acting—it’s the fan favorite remade from scratch with the original recipe.
  • Abundant New Features – Re-PAC means more: new actions for PAC-MAN, updated boss battles, characters, collectables, customizations, even a two-player mode!

PAC-MAN WORLD 2 Re-PAC is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam on September 25 in Japan and September 26 worldwide.

Watch the trailer below.

Gameplay Trailer

English
